channel.title: Python on Peter Theobald
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Peter Theobald

item.title: Dav2Mp4 Convert security cam DAV to MP4
item.description: Many security cameras export video in a proprietary format called DAV which is difficult to work with. I wrote this program to convert DAV videos into standard MP4 video.

item.title: Ghost Solver - In Which We Ruin a Great Game
item.description: My son showed me a new word game, ‘Ghost’, and I wrote a Python program to “solve” the game and find all winning sequences.
